titles.title: Carter G. Woodson Home National Historic Site Act
To establish the Carter G. Woodson Home National Historic Site in the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.
Carter G. Woodson Home National Historic Site Act
Carter G. Woodson Home National Historic Site Act
Carter G. Woodson Home National Historic Site Act
Carter G. Woodson Home National Historic Site Establishment Act of 2003
Carter G. Woodson Home National Historic Site Establishment Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.
Mr. Radanovich moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes debate on H.R. 1012.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Domenici under authority of the order of the Senate of 07/29/03 legislative day 07/21/03 with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 108-138.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 262.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Renzi asked unanimous consent that the House agree to the Senate amendment.

vote.text: On motion that the House agree to the Senate amendment Agreed to without objection.

reference.label: text as House agreed to Senate amendment

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced on February 27, 2003. The summary has been expanded because action occurred on the measure.)Carter G. Woodson Home National Historic Site Establishment Act of 2003 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish as a unit of the National Park System the Carter G. Woodson Home National Historic Site in the District of Columbia.Authorizes appropriations.
